title: Bedcover, ca. 1850
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: running stitch on plain weave; wadding and cords introduced from back
description: White-on-white bedcover with a thin grapevine border on four sides. Central square medallion contains a basket of flowers. Pattern in very high relief with decorative four inch fringe attached to both sides and bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bedcover, ca. 1850. Medium: cotton
Technique: running stitch on plain weave; wadding and cords introduced from back. 1975-16-4.
